title: Sharks and songbirds get new trade protections
description: Nearly 100 species of sharks and rays were added to an international treaty which experts say will help control trade of their meat and fins.

title: Tutankhamun's inspiring 21st Century afterlife
description: Egyptologists are still learning about his life and treasures a century after his tomb was opened.

title: UK weather prompts 'second spring' due to mild November weather
description: Flowers are experiencing a second bloom this year due to the unseasonable temperatures, experts say.

title: Australia: How 'bin chickens' learnt to wash poisonous cane toads
description: The "bin chicken" has figured out how to eat one of the few animals locals hate more - cane toads.

title: Gold coin proves 'fake' Roman emperor was real
description: The coin bearing the name of Sponsian was considered apocryphal and had been locked away in a museum cupboard.

title: COP27: Climate costs deal struck but no fossil fuel progress
description: Rich nations will pay climate damages, but the final deal does not cut fossil fuels further.

title: Climate change: Five key takeaways from COP27
description: The biggest win on climate since the Paris Agreement in 2015... or the biggest loss?

title: COP27: Without Greta, activists make waves at climate summit
description: Young campaigners say they are calling out "greenwashing" at COP27 from the inside.

title: COP27: Lack of women at negotiations raises concern
description: Women barely feature in negotiations in Egypt despite bearing the brunt of climate change.

title: Climate change: Dimming Earth, mustard shortages and other odd side-effects
description: Changes to our planet's shine is just one of the stranger side effects of rising temperatures.

title: What is COP27 and why is it important?
description: This year's climate summit comes amid spiralling energy costs and diplomatic tensions.

title: Nasa's Artemis spacecraft arrives at the Moon
description: Nasa's Orion capsule sweeps past the Moon before entering into a larger orbit.

title: Artemis: Nasa expects humans to live on Moon this decade
description: A senior official tells the BBC the Artemis missions will lead to astronauts living on the Moon.
